item.title: You won’t be seeing the Balatro IP used by casinos or gambling companies - the developer has forbidden it in his will - Rock Paper Shotgun
item.description:
1. You won’t be seeing the Balatro IP used by casinos or gambling companies - the developer has forbidden it in his will  Rock Paper Shotgun
  2. Roguelike hit Balatro can't be sold to any gambling companies or casinos even after its creator dies, because its solo dev is so against that idea they've written it into their will  Gamesradar
  3. Balatro Creator Hates the Thought of Their Game Being Sold to a Casino Enough to Forbid It in Their Will  IGN
  4. Balatro creator says he will never let it be licensed for gambling, even after death  Game Developer
  5. Balatro dev prevents it from becoming a gambling game in cleverest way possible  PCGamesN
